result.reason: Issue #1206 from 2018 reports stored credentials not auto-submitted on connection, but affects multiple protocols (RDP/VNC/SSH) with inconsistent repro ('some machines work, others don't') — requires reporter clarification on protocol, mRemoteNG version, and whether credential inheritance is configured.
result.approach: Ask reporter: which protocol, current version, does the connection use credential inheritance or direct credentials, and does disabling inheritance fix it
